altername_name: Ad Lib Ouji - Prince & Unpleasant Friends
name: Ad Lib Ouji: ...to Fuyukai na Nakamatachi!?
overview: Drawn from a popular Japanese manga serial, Adlib Prince follows the story of a pachinko player named Oji who aspires to become the best shooter in all of Japan. As part of Oji's daily routine, players visit pachinko parlors with the aim of ranking highest in score against other participants. Ardent rivals throw out challenges and Oji must accept them to keep his standing as a top-tier pachinko cat
